column3: News;Phnom Penh: On the morning of October 24
column6: a Slovak man died in a condo CAMTECH (SP360)
column10: Phnom Penh.------Police said that Malina Jozef
column12: had been living on the 4th floor there for more than a year. ------After he hadn’t been seen for a while
column13: the owner knocked on the door
column14: and when there was no reply
column15: also reported to the local police.------The body was taken away to the Khmer-Soviet hosputal and journalists questions were left unanswered for the time being.------Source- Nokor Wat
